sourcesContent:
Items

  • {{item.type}}
    • import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {Item} from "../../model/item"; import {ItemService} from "../../service/item.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-items', templateUrl: './items.component.html', styleUrls: ['./items.component.css'] }) export class ItemsComponent implements OnInit { items: Item[] = []; constructor(private itemService: ItemService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getItems(); } private getItems() { this.itemService.getItems() .subscribe(items => this.items = items); } }
